name: Banshee
overview: Take a classic arcade game. Add a whole heap of seasoning in the form of stylish state-of-the-art graphics and four MASSIVE levels of up-to-date action. Stir in an Alternate Dimension, exquisitely evil aliens and a heavy-sprinkling of mucho-big guns and power-propped planes. Leave to simmer on an incandescent heat and wait for the best blast in light years. • Top down vertically scrolling view! • Choice of three difficulty levels! • Full rotating ray-traced enemies!
